H0.text: when does the heart develop and begin pumping blood. During embryonic formation

H1.text: when does the heart develop and begin pumping blood. Around the 8th week of gestation

H2.text: when does the heart develop and begin pumping blood. At the moment of conception

H3.text: when does the heart develop and begin pumping blood. week 4 of development

A4.text: The human embryonic heart displays cardiac activity approximately 21 days after fertilization

A5.text: The heart is the first functional organ in vertebrate embryos
